thread.title: Lady Gaga jumps from roof of stadium to kick off halftime show
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga jumps from roof of stadium to kick off halftime show

title: Lady Gaga jumps from roof of stadium to kick off halftime show
text:
Manage Lady Gaga jumps from roof of stadium to kick off halftime show Lady Gaga opened up her Super Bowl 51 Halftime Show with a bang after jumping from the roof of NRG Stadium. 
Lady Gaga made a statement to kickoff her Super Bowl halftime show, opening with a rendition of "God Bless America" from the roof of NRG Stadium, set to a backdrop of drones making up a mural of the American Flag. 
Check it out below:
